text: Generate random UTF-8 string in Python
I'd like to test the Unicode handling of my code.
Is there anything I can put in random.choice() to select from the entire Unicode range, preferably not an external module?
Neither Google nor StackOverflow seems to have an answer.
Edit: It looks like this is more complex than expected, so I'll rephrase the question - Is the following code sufficient to generate all valid non-control characters in Unicode?

code:
unicode_glyphs = ''.join(
    unichr(char)
    for char in xrange(1114112) # 0x10ffff + 1
    if unicodedata.category(unichr(char))[0] in ('LMNPSZ')
    )
